original_text: Therefore, I will surely forget you and cast you out of my presence along with the city I gave to you and your ancestors.
korean_text: 내가 너희를 온전히 잊어버리며 내가 너희와 너희 조상들에게 준 이 성읍을 내 앞에서 내버려

sentences.original_text: Therefore, I will surely forget you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 내가 반드시 너를 잊을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and cast you out of my presence
along with the city I gave to you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너에게 주었던 그 성읍과 함께
